item.title: Breaking: FTX CEO John Ray Begins Restart Of Flagship Crypto Exchange
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
Beleaguered crypto exchange FTX begins efforts to relaunch its international crypto exchange, despite losing its reputation in the market, according to a report by Wall Street Journal. The new management team of the crypto exchange detailed how nearly $9 billion in customer funds were misappropriated before the company’s collapse last year. FTX CEO John Ray

The post Breaking: FTX CEO John Ray Begins Restart Of Flagship Crypto Exchange appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: TrueUSD (TUSD) Depegs, Rises To 70% On Curve Pool After Prime Trust Disaster
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
While TrueUSD (TUSD) denies its exposure to crypto custodian Prime Trust, it has depegged for the second time this month. Prime Trust was placed into receivership on Tuesday after rival BitGo called off its bid to acquire Prime Trust. TUSD stablecoin fell to 0.9974 against Tether (USDT) on Binance and 0.80 on Binance.US amid exposure to

The post TrueUSD (TUSD) Depegs, Rises To 70% On Curve Pool After Prime Trust Disaster appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: Dormant Dogecoin Address Finally Reawakens, is a Dump Incoming
item.dc:creator: Godfrey Benjamin
item.description:
A Dogecoin (DOGE) address that went inactive almost a decade ago has been awakened, sparking a suspicion for selloff in the community. Possibilities of Dogecoin Selloff The insights into the wallet activities was provided by crypto analytics protocol Whale Alert which revealed that the Dogecoin address has indeed been dormant for the past 9.5 years.

item.title: Binance Announces New Functions For Bitcoin, ETH, XRP, SHIB, DOGE Auto Invest
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
The world’s largest crypto exchange Binance on Tuesday announces enabling API functionality on Auto-Invest for all users. It allows users to automatically invest in their preferred cryptocurrencies amongst over 210 cryptocurrencies supported on Auto Invest. Auto-Invest is a dollar-cost averaging (DCA) strategy feature that allows users to automate crypto investments and grow their crypto holdings.

The post Binance Announces New Functions For Bitcoin, ETH, XRP, SHIB, DOGE Auto Invest appeared first on CoinGape.
item.content:encoded:
The world’s largest crypto exchange Binance on Tuesday announces enabling API functionality on Auto-Invest for all users. It allows users to automatically invest in their preferred cryptocurrencies amongst over 210 cryptocurrencies supported on Auto Invest. Auto-Invest is a dollar-cost averaging (DCA) strategy feature that allows users to automate crypto investments and grow their crypto holdings.

The post Binance Announces New Functions For Bitcoin, ETH, XRP, SHIB, DOGE Auto Invest appeared first on CoinGape.
